info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 10:38PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Rutherford, southeastern Polk and north central Spartanburg Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1037 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Forest City, or 8 miles northwest of Chesnee, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spindale, Green Creek, Harris and Fingerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
